verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> come <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2807>key<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> bottomless <S%G12>pit<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G254>chain<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he laid hold <S%G2902>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1404>dragon,<s%> that <S%G744>old<s%> <S%G3789>serpent,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1228>Devil,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4567>Satan,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> bottomless <S%G12>pit,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shut him <S%G2808>up,<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> set a <S%G4972>seal<s%> <S%G1883>upon<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he should <S%G4105>deceive<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G2089>more,<s%> <S%G891>till<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> should be <S%G5055>fulfilled:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5023>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G3089>loosed<s%> a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G5550>season.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G2362>thrones,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2917>judgment<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G846>them:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> I saw <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%> of them that were <S%G3990>beheaded<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3141>witness<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> had <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1504>image,<s%> <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G3756><s%> had <S%G2983>received<s%> his <S%G5480>mark<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G3359>foreheads,<s%> <S%G2532>or<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G5495>hands;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2198>lived<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G936>reigned<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3062>rest<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> lived not <S%G326>again<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> were <S%G5055>finished.<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> is <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G386>resurrection.<s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G40>holy<s%> is he that <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G386>resurrection:<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G5130>such<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1849>power,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> they shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G2409>priests<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G936>reign<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> a <S%G5507>thousand<s%> <S%G2094>years.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> shall go <S%G1831>out<s%> to <S%G4105>deceive<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G1137>quarters<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G1136>Gog<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3098>Magog,<s%> to gather them <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4171>battle:<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G3739>whom<s%> is <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G285>sand<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4114>breadth<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> compassed the camp of the saints <S%G2944>about,<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3925><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G40><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G25>beloved<s%> <S%G4172>city:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4442>fire<s%> came <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2719>devoured<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1228>devil<s%> that <S%G4105>deceived<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> was <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2303>brimstone,<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2342>beast<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> false <S%G5578>prophet<s%> are, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall be <S%G928>tormented<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> forever and <S%G1519>ever<s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G165><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> him that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> fled <S%G5343>away;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there was <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> for <S%G846>them.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G3398>small<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3173>great,<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G975>books<s%> were <S%G455>opened:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G975>book<s%> was <S%G455>opened,<s%> which <S%G3603>is<s%> the book of <S%G2222>life:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> were <S%G2919>judged<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> those things which were <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G975>books,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G2041>works.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2281>sea<s%> gave <S%G1325>up<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> which were <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>it;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G86>hell<s%> delivered <S%G1325>up<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3498>dead<s%> which were <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>them:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they were <S%G2919>judged<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G2041>works.<s%>
